Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Declined out of all reviewer response activities
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of SW-Reviewer Declined per case
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities grouped by the last value of code

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Declined that occur after SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Declined compared to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Declined that are followed by additional SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Ratio of SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Reviewer Agreed in each process variant
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of cases with multiple SW-Reviewer Declined activities
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Declined' grouped by the last value of code

Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Declined after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Declined that occur before SW-Reviewer Selection is now due
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Number of SW-Reviewer Declined compared to SW-Reviewer Unavailable
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Unavailable' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Declined in variants that eventually reach SW-EIC Accept
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of consecutive SW-Reviewer Declined activities
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Declined' grouped by the last value of code

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Declined that occur after SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days'

Name: Ratio of SW-Reviewer Declined to total reviewer assignment attempts
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Declined followed by Assign a Different Editor
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Number of SW-Reviewer Declined in scientific paper review processes
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Declined that occur in manuscripts requiring major revisions
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Declined compared to SW-Reviewer No Response
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Declined in challenge paper assignments
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers Challenge Paper'

Name: Number of SW-Reviewer Declined per manuscript type
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities grouped by the last value of code
